titleInfo.title: Ford E. and Harriet R. Curtis Theatre Collection of Pittsburgh Performing Arts Information Files 1879 - 2018 1974 - 1998

mods.abstract: The Ford E. and Harriet R. Curtis Theatre Collection of Pittsburgh Performing Arts Information Files contain programs, news clippings, press releases and other materials about Pittsburgh performing arts groups, individuals, and venues. There is at least one folder in the Information File for each of the headings listed below.

This collection contains newspaper clippings, programs, and other ephemera relating to performing arts companies in the Pittsburgh area. It also contains files with materials relating to individuals from the Pittsburgh area. The files are arranged alphabetically. Please note that while some of the dates listed for the folders go back to the nineteenth century, most of the older clippings are preservation photocopies and the originals have been discarded. Materials are sometimes transferred from this collection to the Curtis Collection of Pittsburgh Theatre Programs.

New materials are added to the collection by the staff of the Curtis Theatre Collection. Donations are occasionally added to the collection. These donations come from the producing groups themselves or members of the public. If you are interested in donating materials to the collection, please contact the Archives & Special Collections department staff.
